start.name: D6
text: im d6
you.
Only appears if the player is on dSiiiiiix's friends list
man i could really go for some graham crackers right about now
Only appears if the current day is Monday
and if youuuuuu cant believe it
Only appears if the current day is Friday
i cant believe i had to drive all the way to work
would you like to sign my petition? ...nevermind

varA1a.name: System
text: Would you like a random variant or to select a variant?

varA1b.name: System
text: Which variant would you like to select? (Page 1/4)
choices: After having wisdom today; ''you've had enough wisdom for today. come back tomorrow''
If you use an alt account after having wisdom today; ''hey... you're not trying to use a different account to cheat the system are you''
If you use another alt account after having wisdom twice; ''hey there again you have multiple alts then huh''
''if you come to a fork in the road, pick it up''
''i did the art for the limbobbia tutorial. you should try it if you haven't''

varA1c.name: System
text: Which variant would you like to select? (Page 2/4)
choices: Any Day but Thursday; ''today is not thursday.''
''do not hesitate to defend yourself. you won't regret it''
''thank Noble for doing all this; without it i would have no wisdom to share.''
''i am sincerely sorry for your loss''
''your lucky numbers for the day are [5 random 1-2 digit integers] and [random 1-2 digit integer]''
''if you don't like the new roblox death sound, you can change it to whatever you want.''
''you can adjust the game volume via the pause menu''

varA1d.name: System
text: Which variant would you like to select? (Page 3/4)
choices: ''we have done something wrong at one point''
''he's going to betray you, you know.''
''the remains of our ancestors lie beneath our feet''
''also try boneworks, if you have vr''
''i can kill you in two different ways''

varA1e.name: System
text: Which variant would you like to select? (Page 4/4)
choices: ''i can't tell you what the Tool does you have to figure it out yourself''

wisdomA1B1.name: D6
text: give me the keyboard
Only appears if your on PC

wisdomA1B2.name: D6
text: give me your phone
Only appears if your on phone

wisdomA1B3.name: D6
text: give me the controller
Only appears if your on console

wisdomA2B1.name: D6
text: you've had enough wisdom for today. come back tomorrow
Only appears if the player has previously selected this option within the last 12 hours

wisdomA2B2a.name: D6
text: hey...

wisdomA2B2b.name: D6
text: you're not trying to use a different account to cheat the system are you
Only appears if the player has selected this option on a different account under the same device

wisdomA2B2c.name: D6
text: for shame

wisdomA2B2d.name: D6
text: i'll still give you the wisdom though

wisdomA2B3a.name: D6
text: hey there again

wisdomA2B3b.name: D6
text: you have multiple alts then huh
Only appears if the player has selected this option on yet another account under the same device, following Variant 2B

wisdomA2B3c.name: D6
text: that's cool i guess

wisdomA3.name: D6
text: live to die

wisdomA4.name: D6
text: if you come to a fork in the road, pick it up

wisdomA5.name: D6
text: you are playing it wrong

wisdomA6.name: D6
text: i did the art for the limbobbia tutorial. you should try it if you haven't

wisdomA7B1.name: D6
text: today is thursday.
Only appears if today is Thursday

wisdomA7B2.name: D6
text: today is not thursday
Only appears if today is not Thursday

wisdomA8.name: D6
text: do not hesitate to defend yourself. you won't regret it

wisdomA9.name: D6
text: support your local trash goblin

wisdomA10.name: D6
text: thank Noble for doing all this; without it i would have no wisdom to share.

wisdomA11.name: D6
text: i am sincerely sorry for your loss

wisdomA12.name: D6
text: your lucky numbers for the day are [5 random 1-2 digit integers] and [random 1-2 digit integer]

wisdomA13.name: D6
text: nobody knows the troubles you've seen

wisdomA14a.name: D6
text: if you don't like the new roblox death sound, you can change it to whatever you want.

wisdomA14b.name: D6
text: open the file location of your RobloxPlayerLauncher.exe

wisdomA14c.name: D6
text: go to content, then sounds. replace ouch.ogg with any .ogg file you want, rename it to ouch.ogg

wisdomA15.name: D6
text: you can adjust the game volume via the pause menu

wisdomA16.name: D6
text: stand up for yourself

wisdomA17a.name: D6
text: we have done something wrong at one point

wisdomA17b.name: D6
text: something we can never undo

wisdomA17c.name: D6
text: and for this we are being punished

wisdomA17d.name: D6
text: This is our eternity, our prison.

wisdomA18.name: D6
text: he's going to betray you, you know.

wisdomA19.name: D6
text: exploration can only lead to disappointment.

wisdomA20a.name: D6
text: the remains of our ancestors lie beneath our feet

wisdomA20b.name: D6
text: sometimes i can still hear their voices

wisdomA20c.name: D6
text: screaming

wisdomA20d.name: D6
text: but sometimes its hard to hear them over my own screams.

wisdomA21.name: D6
text: the end is never

wisdomA22.name: D6
text: only a sinner

wisdomA23.name: D6
text: also try lethal league blaze

wisdomA24.name: D6
text: also try boneworks, if you have vr

wisdomA25.name: D6
text: i can kill you in two different ways

wisdomA26.name: D6
text: i can't tell you what the Tool does you have to figure it out yourself

wisdomA27.name: D6
text: you will never be forgiven

wisdomA28.name: D6
text: think for yourself

wisdomA29.name: D6
text: believe in yourself

wisdomA30.name: D6
text: question authority

wisdomA31.name: D6
text: go outside

wisdomA32.name: D6
text: don't leave the house today

wisdomA33.name: D6
text: my brain hurts

wisdomA34.name: D6
text: may your troubles be many

talk.name: D6
text: what
choices: Why are you in a dumpster?

talkB1.name: D6
text: why havent you been flattened by a 2 ton slab of concrete
A 2 ton slab of concrete falls from the sky and kills the player, unless under cover.

talkB2a.name: D6
text: Why

talkB2b.name: D6
text: thats fair. 1
thats fair. 2
thats fair. 3
thats fair. 4
thats fair. 5
thats fair. 6

talkB2c.name: D6
text: ok

talkB3.name: D6

talkB4a.name: D6
text: im

talkB4b.name: D6

choices: Yeah, but like what do you DO?

talkB4c.name: D6
text: yeah how about you learn to listen the first time

talkB4d.name: D6
text: hi

talkB5.name: D6
text: hi
Only appears if it's the players first time selecting this option
hey there again
Only appears if it's not the players first time selecting this option

nvm.name: D6
text: 7577234764 Dont forget it. It's the only way out.
ok

tell.name: D6
text: ok

varA2a.name: System
text: Would you like a random variant or to select a variant?

varA2b.name: System
text: Which variant would you like to select / preview? (Page 1/2)
choices: ''if i hear that dumb smelly protogen mention ram one more time...''
''i'm not allowed in the store anymore since i keep shoplifting but...''
''sometimes i feel the sudden urge to break into someone's house and...''
''Do not let it affect you in the moment. It is all ultimately meaningless...''
''i think i could beat that cat on the bus in a fist fight''
''hey so do you know what those guys are selling in there theyve chased me out with a broom like 6 times already...''

varA2c.name: System
text: Which variant would you like to select? (Page 2/2)
choices: ''i am sincerely sorry for your loss''

tellA1.name: D6
text: dude... GLAGGLELAND??????

text: im d6

tellA2B1a.name: D6
text: The player then immediately explodes.

tellA2B2a.name: D6
text: d6

tellA3.name: D6
text: if i hear that dumb smelly protogen mention ram one more time im gonna RAM a 2 ton block of concrete into their stupid face.

tellA4.name: D6
text: i'm not allowed in the store anymore since i keep shoplifting but if you see disc or green tell them i said hi and that im sorry and that it will happen again

tellA5a.name: D6
text: lets talk about

tellA5b.name: D6
text: embalming fluid

tellA6a.name: D6
text: sometimes i feel the sudden urge to break into someone's house and talk about turtle skeletons from a specific video game franchise for hours.

tellA6b.name: D6
text: say hi to zeon for me

tellA7.name: D6
text: Do not let it affect you in the moment. It is all ultimately meaningless. The passage of time spares none, has spared none, and will spare none. You are no exception.

tellA8.name: D6
text: i think i could beat that cat on the bus in a fist fight

tellA9a.name: D6
text: hey so do you know what those guys are selling in there theyve chased me out with a broom like 6 times already.

tellA9b.name: D6
text: its probably because ive stolen like 4 or 5 of their hey why am i telling you this

tellA9c.name: D6
text: get outta here

tellA10a.name: D6
text: you got anything to eat

tellA10b.name: D6
text: hand it over im starving

tellA10c.name: D6
text: thanks
The player hands D6 a random consumable item.

tellA10d.name: D6
text: please ill give you this handy dandy Tool

tellA10e.name: D6
text: pleasure doing business
The player hands D6 a random consumable item and receives a Tool.

tellA10f.name: D6
text: You think this is a game? Do you find this amusing?

text: i am sincerely sorry for your loss

tellA12.name: D6
